dn8:19.5.pli: Sa kho so, kassapa, bhikkhu evaṁ sīlasampanno na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ sīlasaṁvarato.
dn8:19.5.en: A mendicant thus accomplished in ethics sees [38;5;121mno danger in any quarter[0m in regards to their ethical restraint.

dn8:19.6.pli: Seyyathāpi, kassapa, rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto nihatapaccāmitto na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ paccatthikato;
dn8:19.6.en: It’s like a king who has defeated his enemies. He sees no danger from his foes in any quarter.

dn8:19.7.pli: evameva kho, kassapa, bhikkhu evaṁ sīlasampanno na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ sīlasaṁvarato.
dn8:19.7.en: In the same way, a mendicant thus accomplished in ethics sees [38;5;121mno danger in any quarter[0m in regards to their ethical restraint.

dn10:1.29.1.pli: Sa kho so, māṇava, bhikkhu evaṁ sīlasampanno na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ sīlasaṁvarato.
dn10:1.29.1.en: A mendicant thus accomplished in ethics sees [38;5;121mno danger in any quarter[0m in regards to their ethical restraint.

dn10:1.29.2.pli: Seyyathāpi, māṇava, rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto nihatapaccāmitto na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ paccatthikato;
dn10:1.29.2.en: It’s like a king who has defeated his enemies. He sees no danger from his foes in any quarter.

dn10:1.29.3.pli: evameva kho, māṇava, bhikkhu evaṁ sīlasampanno na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ sīlasaṁvarato.
dn10:1.29.3.en: A mendicant thus accomplished in ethics sees [38;5;121mno danger in any quarter[0m in regards to their ethical restraint.

dn2:63.1.pli: Sa kho so, mahārāja, bhikkhu evaṁ sīlasampanno na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ sīlasaṁvarato.
dn2:63.1.en: A mendicant thus accomplished in ethics sees [38;5;121mno danger in any quarter[0m in regards to their ethical restraint.

dn2:63.2.pli: Seyyathāpi, mahārāja, rājā khattiyo muddhābhisitto nihatapaccāmitto na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ paccatthikato;
dn2:63.2.en: It’s like a king who has defeated his enemies. He sees no danger from his foes in any quarter.

dn2:63.3.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, bhikkhu evaṁ sīlasampanno na kutoci bhayaṁ samanupassati, yadidaṁ sīlasaṁvarato.
dn2:63.3.en: In the same way, a mendicant thus accomplished in ethics sees [38;5;121mno danger in any quarter[0m in regards to their ethical restraint.
